TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit EntityException extends System.Data.DataException

Docs.summary: Represents Entity Framework-related errors that occur in the `EntityClient` namespace. The `EntityException` is the base class for all Entity Framework exceptions thrown by the `EntityClient`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about how to handle code exceptions, see <xref:System.Exception>.
